name: moneyspace
description:
money man has accidental run-ins while carrying cache 

unfinshed beginning of a game written in pico8 virtual machine using something similar to lua

exported to html, linux, mac, windows 

Thanks to buffalo game space and techstars for facilitaing the event.  I learned a lot about coding and design and had fun.
